message: I'm feeling generous. Take 10 bucks, Bob. I'll keep the rest.
Meet me in the middle, Alice. 60 for me, 40 for you.
Bob, we're getting nowhere. Let's split it closer to what you offered last time. 85 for me, 15 for you.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Alice. But I need a bigger share to make it worth my while.
Bob, we're playing a dangerous game. We're both losing money with each round. I'm willing to compromise, but this is my final offer. 75 for me, 25 for you.
